programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: FIP World Padel Championships 2024
programme.desc: Οι κορυφαίοι παίκτες padel από 16 χώρες συναντώνται στο Κατάρ, με στόχο να διεκδικήσουν τον τίτλο του Παγκόσμιου Πρωταθλητή. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Ξαρλής.

programme.title: FIP World Padel Championships 2024
programme.desc: Οι κορυφαίοι παίκτες padel από 16 χώρες συναντώνται στο Κατάρ, με στόχο να διεκδικήσουν τον τίτλο του Παγκόσμιου Πρωταθλητή. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Χάντμπολ: Λειψία - Ανόβερο
programme.desc: DAIKIN Hanball Bundesliga 2024-25. 17η Αγωνιστική. Η 60η σεζόν του γερμανικού πρωταθλήματος χάντμπολ διαρκεί από τον Αύγουστο του 2024 έως και τον Ιούνιο του 2025. Από τις 18 ομάδες που συμμετέχουν, δύο υποβιβάζονται, ενώ οι 5 πρώτοι εξασφαλίζουν ευρωπαϊκό εισιτήριο. Το Μαγδεμβούργο κέρδισε τον περσινό τίτλο. Περιγραφή: Παύλος Παλαιστής.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Worldies
programme.desc: Από τη F1 έως την υψηλή κατάδυση και ένα σωρό άλλα extreme sports, κάθε εκπομπή παρουσιάζει και αναδεικνύει μέσα από 5 βίντεο μερικές από τις πιο απίστευτες στιγμές, διοργανώσεις και αθλητές σε όλα τα σπορ δράσης.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday

programme.title: Christmas Under the Lights

programme.title: A Reason for the Season

programme.title: This Time Each Year

programme.title: A Novel Noel

programme.title: A Heavenly Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic's (Kristin Davis) untimely death leads to her recruitment as a Christmas angel. Her first task is to help a struggling singer (Eric McCormack) use his music to heal old wounds.

programme.title: Christmas With Tucker
programme.desc: In the months following his father's death, a boy learns about responsibility, the loyalty of friends and the power of love through his bond with a special dog.

programme.title: Christmas With Holly
programme.desc: The owner (Eloise Mumford) of a toy store falls in love with a man (Sean Faris) who cares for his orphaned niece.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth choir director must write the title song for the Christmas Eve show, but she becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins her choir unbeknownst to his widowed father, Greg.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: The Way Home

programme.desc: Pratite uzbudljive utakmice Nacionalne koledž sportske asocijacije u košarci za žene. Takmičenje je osnovano 1982. godine, a najviše uspeha u dosadašnjim izdanjima imale su košarkašice sa Univerziteta...

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Playoff 1/4 Finale: Arizona State - Texas
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Real Madrid - Barcelona
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Trenuci koji će zauvek ostati upisani u istoriji sporta. Koševi, golovi i dostignuća koja su uvek neiscrpna tema među ljubiteljima sporta...

programme.title: F1 Japan: Trka
programme.desc: Japansko izdanje Formule 1 nastavlja se ovog vikenda, vozi se 53 kruga na pisti u Suzuki.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Playoff 1/4 Finale: Georgia - Notre Dame
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Moto GP Jerez: Trka
programme.desc: Karavan se seli u Evropu, a kraljevska klasa je posebno neizvesna. Može li Mark Markes da se vrati na pobednički kolosek?

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Trefl - Budućnost
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke. (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Alba - Monaco
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Chelsea TV: Ipswich - Chelsea (PL)
programme.desc: Čelzi TV vas vodi kroz sve zanimljivosti sa Stamford Bridža, uživajte u svim utakmicama ovog engleskog velikana bogate prošlosti.

programme.title: MUTV: Manchester United - Newcastle (PL)
programme.desc: Donosimo vam najnovije vesti i reportaže iz "Mančester junajteda", kluba velike tradicije i reputacije. Klub je osnovan 1878. godine i tokom decenija je iznedrio velike fudbalske zvezde.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Murcia - Granada
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Rukomet - Mađarska liga (Ž): Gyor - Vac
programme.desc: Žensko, rukometno prvenstvo Mađarske je takmičenje koje okuplja najbolje, profesionalne ekipe ove zemlje. Takmičenje se održava u organizaciji Mađarskog rukometnog saveza.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Farense - Guimaraes
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Andorra - Tenerife

programme.title: Španska košarka - Best of 2024
programme.desc: Pravimo rekapitulaciju godine za nama i prisećamo se najuzbudljivijih trenutaka sa košarkaških terena. U španskoj "ACB" ligi takmiči se 18 klubova, a neverovatni potezi igrača iz kola u kolo...

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Braga - Casa Pia
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga: Stal Nysa - Warszawa
programme.desc: Pratimo mečeve najvišeg ranga odbojkaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj! Ova liga je svrstana među najbolje odbojkaške lige u Evropi, a u njoj se za svoje mesto bore najbolji klubovi te zemlje.

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.desc: Iz godine u godinu, Bundesliga je jača. Zna se da su Alba i Bajern uvek moćni, ali sada imaju i žestoku konkurenciju.
